-class Carro:%0A    def __init__(self, pass: int):%0A        self.pass: int = pass%0A        self.passMax: int = 2%0A        self.gasMax: int = 100%0A        self.gas: int = 0%0A        self.km: int = 0%0A    %0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return f%22pass: %7Bself.pass%7D, gas: %7Bself.gas%7D, km %7Bself.km%7D%22%0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0A    %0Adef main():%0A    carro = Carro(0)%0A    while True:%0A        line: str = input()%0A        print(f%22$%22 + line)%0A        args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(carro)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22enter%22:%0A            carro.enter()%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22leave%22:%0A            carro.leave()%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22fuel%22:%0A            increment = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            carro.fuel(increment)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22drive%22:%0A            increment = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A            carro.drive(increment)%0A            %0Amain()
